title: My favorite mids are Galio and Anivia.
body:
They're not my best, but I've played them only a few times each and I've got to an acceptable level with them that they're viable ranked picks for me.

Galio is awesome because you just stack MR and dare Katarina to ult you. Once I have  some mana regen EQ farms the entire wave. I'm like Xerath in that respect, but I also don't die.

Anivia is awesome for 2 reasons. 1. is her passive, which means they can't all in  you, then leave you to die with ignite. Your tower is also MUCH safer. 2. is that once you get tear/catalyst, you can just farm with your ult from a distance forever, and throw Qs until you land one, then demolish the recipient.

Why are these two so uncommon? They're not hard. Galio's a bit susceptible to ganks early, but one ward fixes that.
